title: What to Read This Week
sub_head: Louis Menand on Cold War culture, a lost novel from Richard Wright, the life of a real Renaissance Man and more.
body:
Louis Menand looks at how the postwar struggle between the U.S. and the Soviet Union saturated art, books, music and more. Review by Edward Rothstein.
Read the review

A tale of subterranean discovery from the author of ‘Native Son.’ Review by Clifford Thompson.
